label: 貫
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 3:  Medieval Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1990
説明文: Unit of weight equivalent to 3,759 grams or 3.759 kilograms. Because the modal weight of one Chinese or illegally minted domestic copper coin (mon) was 3.75 grams, one kan of coins was roughly equivalent to one thousand coins; see mon.↓[文]
